'''Thundering Might''' is [[Keqing]]'s Level 1 [[Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The extra DMG dealt by this Constellation is considered Elemental Skill DMG, but cannot trigger [[Sacrificial Sword]]'s passive.
